name: Wand of Conducting
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and create orchestral music by waving it around. The music can be heard out to a range of 60 feet and ends when you stop waving the wand.
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, a sad tuba sound plays as the wand crumbles to dust and is destroyed.
